Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-la
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: brrda phu thi mi khwam phid ca pen thi rucak kan dithi kheruxnghmay khxng phwk khea læw ca thuk cab trng phm thi pk hnaphak khux khmab læa thea (læw lak lng nrk)
dangnan dwy buy khun xan dı lea hæng phracea khxng cea thang sxng thi cea thang sxng ptiseth
ni khux nrk sung brrda phu thi mi khwam phid ptiseth mi yxm cheux
phwk khea ca dein wk weiyn xyu rxb «rahwang man kab na rxn thi deuxd
dangnan dwy buy khun xan dı lea hæng phracea khxng cea thang sxng thi cea thang sxng ptiseth
